name: Buybox
headline: Display a product with different sellers, featuring the best offer
overview: With this app, you will be able to define seller eligibility rules for a product and feature the best offer to the customer.
additionalInformation: After installing this app, you must configure it in the store theme, in a product context.
features: Rank sellers of a product based on custom criteria
Create your own sorting strategy using expressions with product attributes
Flexibility to use predefined or custom sorting settings
